Class Receptionist

    • Model.Employee
      • Model.Receptionist

    public class Receptionist
extends Employee
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class Receptionist ~ represent a single Receptionist of the company, inheritor of Employee
    Author:
    Java Course Team 2017 - Shai Gutman, University Of Haifa - Israel, ID: 205791056

      • addSubscription

        public boolean addSubscription(Subscription subscription)
        This method adds a subscription to the subscriptions array only if it doesn't already exist in receptionist's subscriptions array
        Parameters:
        subscription - to be added
        Returns:
        true if the subscription was added successfully, false otherwise
